issue.title: RecordBuilder UnmarshalJSON does not handle extra unknown fields
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16456](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16456). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When calling array.RecordBuilder.UnmarshalJSON with a JSON object that contains fields that are unknown to the RecordBuilder's schema, it fails to decode the JSON object properly and will panic.
